attributes.comment: CMS that the national directory should be developed where CMS is not creating a centralized directory but a distributed solution where data from healthcare service providers and other services is stored regionally or at the state level to ensure accuracy.  This approach will help with lowering the overall maintenance cost to CMS and standardize the data needed to support the consistent submission. It will also provide the regional entities validate the accuracy of the submitted data. This approach is based on the successful model of submitting data in the criminal justice from 18,000 law enforcement agencies to the FBI system.
